EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Spring Days_Q217.Chicago Spring Days Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending Spring Days Chicago 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello there,
Thanks for coming out, participating, and being part of the community last week in Chicago. Please take this survey <[[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1w2SMHxqqOGp_IEGPNvQsDO1ltXIFcb9EfReiy8iIX04/edit]]> so we can improve the event, we want you to recommend it to your co-workers!
Network and learn from Spring community leaders at SpringOne Platform 2017 <[[http://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]> taking place in December 1-4 in San Francisco. If you register before June 24th you can save $400. Want a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby venue? Simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]>, a great public cloud for running Spring Framework (and .NET) on Cloud Foundry on AWS!
Looking for Spring Days slides? You can find them, along with blogs, videos and all things Spring Days here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/spring-days-chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]>.
Stay in touch with our team and join the Spring conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/springcentral]]>. I hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]>!
Thanks, Tasha Isenberg tisenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:tisenberg@pivotal.io]]>
